Equipment upgrading allows you to change the grade of weapons, armor and accessories. In order to do that, you need to collect all necessary materials.
But unfortunately shields and sigils cannot be upgraded. Weapons can be upgraded after +7 enchant level, armor - after +6 enchant level, circlets, Dragon Skin Shirt, Kaliel's Bracelet, La Vie En Rose's Brooch and Artifact Books - after +5 enchant level.
